item.title: Use OpenSSL to issue certificates
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Generate client private key: Copy 1 openssl genrsa -out server.key 2048 Generate client certificate: Copy 1 openssl req -new -sha256 -x509 -days 3650 -key server.key -out server.crt Certificate application file: Copy 1 openssl req -new -key server.key -out server.csr Generate CA private key Use des3 encryption, and enter a password of more than 4 digits: Copy 1 openssl genrsa -des3 -out ca.key 4096 Generate CA certificate Copy 1 openssl req
